cms.query.QueryText:
WITH GI_CTE(POSNumber,ProgramID,Status) As ( select s.SKUProductCustomerReferenceNumber as POSNumber,Program.ProgramID,C.Status from KDA_CampaignsProduct p left join View_CMS_Tree_joined t on p.CampaignsProductID=t.DocumentForeignKeyValue left join COM_SKU s on s.SKUID=t.NodeSKUID left join KDA_Program Program on p.ProgramID=Program.ProgramID left join KDA_Campaign C on C.CampaignID= Program.CampaignID )
select KDA_POSNumber.POSNumber from KDA_POSNumber left join GI_CTE CTE on CTE.POSNumber=CAST(KDA_POSNumber.POSNumber as nvarchar(100)) where CTE.POSNumber is null or CTE.Status=0 order by POSNumber
